meanings.sent1: She spoke impolitely to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: He always behaves impolitely towards his classmates.

meanings.sent4: The engine roared impolitely, disturbing the peace.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared impolitely, startling everyone awake.
